content.rendered:
Losing weight or fat is not that easy as it sounds. It takes so much dedication, determination and patience. As we all know in order to get rid of fat we need to balance our diet and focus on weight training and cardio but sometimes these things are not gives you results alone, here natural Fat burner capsules come into play, don’t assume fat burners will give you jaw-dropping results single-handedly. It just increases the fat loss process if you add this in your daily routine. so in this article, I will share Best Fat Burner 2020 and provide you all the information.

Table of Content

How Does Fat Burner work?
Best Fat Burner in India
Important Ingredients in Fat Burner
Fat Burner Side Effects
Conclusion
FAQ

How Does Fat Burner work?

Losing weight or cutting extra layer of fat is not so easy, your workout and diet has to be on point. When you are doing everything perfectly so fat burner will work as guaranteed weight loss pills and increase that process little fast. Now, many of you will confuse what is a fat burner and how it’s work…….?

Fat Burner is a nutrition supplement that increases fat metabolism in your body which gives you more energy and maximize your strength and increase the quality of your workout. All fat burners have one important ingredient called caffeine and Green tea fat burner extracts, these are the main essence which helps you to focus during your workout session.

When you consume fat burner so it basically suppresses your appetite which minimizes your hunger, now when you eat less so you won’t get much energy during the workout so the second thing fat burners do, it provides you energy. Now, during your workout, your body burns all the glycogen during the cardio session now in order to provide you energy during weight training Fat burner will convert your stored fat into energy so that you can burn those extra inches from your body.

Best Fat Burner in India

These are Best Fat Burner in India

  • Nutrex Lipo 6 Fat Burner supplement
  • Muscletech Hydroxycut Hardcore Next-Gen
  • Muscleblaze Fat Burner
  • Naturyz LEAN CUTZ Fat Burner
  • MusclePharm CLA Core Fat Burner
  • Being Nutritions-SHREX Fat Burner
  • Universal NutritionAnimal Cuts
  • BPI Sports B4-60 COUNT
  • GNC Burn 60 Fat Cutter
  • Sinew Nutrition Natural Fat Burner

Nutrex Lipo 6 Fat Burner supplement

Nutrex Lipo 6 Fat Burner supplement could be your best option to pick. It contains Advantra-Z which increases the metabolic rate and activate metabolism which burns extra calories and make your diet and weight loss goals become a success.

This product contains fast-absorbing liquid capsules which provides you instant energy. The company claims that this is by far one of the strongest Lipo 6 formula they have ever released. according to them, one capsule of this supplement gives you energy which is equal to 8 cups of coffee.

This product comes in a plastic bottle with 2 packaging contains 60 capsules and 120 capsules If you are a beginner and want to try 1st time so company highly recommend taking only 1 capsule in a day.

As per health experts, regular usage of fat burners may lead you into some health issue so you can use this product for 2 months and take a break for 2 weeks and repeat this cycle for better results.

Muscletech Hydroxycut Hardcore Next Gen

Muscletech Hydroxycut Hardcore Next Gen is one of the best fat burner for men in the market which gives you massive results. It is specially designed for active men and women who are looking to lose weight and boost their energy.

This fat burner has amazing ingredients called canephora robusta which target your stored stubborn fat and convert into energy so that you can burn it through your workout.

It also contain green coffee for real weight loss results, it helps to enhance mental focus. This product produces a powerful state of thermogenesis in the body to help fire up the metabolic rate.

The new and unique combination of Red Sage extract, Blue Skullcap and Ginger along with other enhancing ingredients delivers a new sensory experience that is one of a kind.

Please be reminded that it’s a non-vegetarian product. You can take 2 capsules in a day and do not exceed 4 capsules in a 24 hour period also avoid usage within 5 hours of bedtime.

Muscleblaze Fat Burner

Muscleblaze Fat Burner is a revolutionary blend of green tea and grapefruit extract. it helps in keeping you full for a longer span of time, helping in lowering craving for unhealthy food. Also, helps to enhance the fat burn rate naturally.

Muscle-blaze is an emerging brand which is known for its quality products, worlds best testing medical company Labdoor proves that Muscle-blaze products are authentic which makes this product more buyer-friendly.

This health supplement contains Garcinia Cambogia that boost fat burn rate naturally. also, it does not contain any added caffeine so it is also a nature-friendly product without any side effect.

It also has Piper Nigrum Extract that works as an effective appetite suppressant to help manage an effective weight loss diet. We recommend you to consume 1 capsule thrice a day before meals or as recommended by your dietitian.

Naturyz LEAN CUTZ Thermogenic Fat Burner

Naturyz LEAN CUTZ Thermogenic Fat Burner is the best fat burner for belly fat, it contains all the important natural ingredients with weight management properties in optimal doses for best results.

This health supplement contains 500mg Acetyl L Carnitine, Green tea, Garcinia Cambogia Extract, Green Coffee Bean Extract, Caffeine & Chromium. all these ingredients will drastically improve your metabolism and your fat-burning process.

This product also has Caffeine & Chromium that helps to build focus for a quality workout and endurance for a long workout session. it also kills obesity and promotes overall wellness.

This fat burner contains a high amount of hydroxycitric acid which increases fat metabolism as a result of burning more fat. you can consume 1 capsule in a day before meals or as recommended by your dietitian.

MusclePharm CLA Core Fat Burner

If you are looking for a high-quality natural fat burner capsules so you can pick MusclePharm CLA Core Fat Burner without wavering your mind. this health supplement has all the important ingredients that your body needs.

Its a gluten-free fat burner and does not contain any artificial dye or colour. If you are looking for a lean and ripped physique so you can go for this product. it maintains your muscle mass while burning fat faster.

It helps boost the immune response to keep you free from common health issues. The anti-inflammatory function of this product increases the natural detoxification process and also enhance your overall liver health.

One of the primary benefits of CLA is that it maximizes your heart rate naturally which increases your metabolism. As a result, stored fats convert into energy that you need to support the increased metabolic activity.

Being Nutritions-SHREX ADVANCE Fat Burner

Most of the fat burner in the market use a large amount of ‘Caffeine Anhydrous’ and high doses of this substance may harm your body but Being Nutritions-SHREX ADVANCE Fat Burner is a natural fat burner with no added caffeine. so you can go with this product it is 100% safe.

This health supplement is a pure vegetarian product which made using pure and natural plant-based ingredients that give you maximum results for a fat burn with zero side effects. 

If you are looking for more strength, stamina and enthusiasm so this product can be your best pick and it is for both men and women. It is not only helps to reduce the extra body fat effectively but also promotes higher energy levels and mental focus throughout the day.

This product comes in a plastic bottle with packaging contains 90 capsules. you can take 1 capsule twice a day before a meal or as recommended by your dietitian.

Universal Nutrition Animal Cuts

Universal Nutrition Animal Cuts is a Thermogenic best weight loss pills. It contains 8 powerful weight loss complexes which target your fat from every angle to maximize your fat loss and get you shredded results.

This health supplement will not only target your fat but also it will remove water weight from your body. sometimes you can lose your fat but Water sits on top of your muscles and make you feel bloated so this supplement will help you to get rid of water weight as well.

This product has Jojoba extract that cuts down your sugar and carb cravings and gives you energy for a quality workout session. It also has a Nootropic complex which supplies oxygen to your brain, making it calmer. 

you can use this product for 3 weeks straight and take a break for 1 week and repeat this cycle for better results, take 2 caplets in a day or as directed by the dietician.

BPI Sports B4-60 COUNT

BPI Sports B4-60 COUNT is an amazing fat burning diet pills. It is a vegetarian product and it’s double duty sports performance supplement that keeps you focused and energized. It targets those areas where it’s harder to lose fat.

This health supplement compounds can help to increase concentrations of both norepinephrine AND dopamine, By increasing neuro concentrations of these transmitters, you can experience extreme appetite suppression that improves mood, focus, and energy capacity.

This supplement has Caffeine Anhydrous which Considered a Purer Form of Caffeine and much more effective. It Provides You Long-Lasting, Extreme Energy Boost, as well as enhanced your focus.

This is perfect to take As a Pre-Workout, I wouldn’t recommend taking them when you’re not planning on going to the gym. You can take 1 capsule 30 minutes before workout or as directed by a qualified healthcare practitioner.

GNC Burn 60 Fat Cutter

GNC Burn 60 Fat Cutter is a clinically proven thermogenic formula that helps to enhance metabolism, burn calories and boost energy levels. The company claims that this supplement burns 60% enhance metabolism.

It a cinnamon-flavoured based fat burner which comes into capsules form. It contains guarana seed extracts that enhance cellular metabolic activity.

GNC Burn 60 is an amazing dietary product that promises to help you burn more calories after each dose. this product targets those who are working on their diets but want to see results more quickly. 

This health supplement comes into capsules from, You can take 1 capsule in a day before a meal or as recommended by your dietitian.

Sinew Nutrition Natural Fat Burner

Sinew Nutrition Natural Fat Burner is specially formulated to help reduce body fat, increase energy and enhance metabolism which promotes weight loss and gives desired results in less time which makes it best fat burner for beginners.

This health supplement contains ingredients like Green Tea, L-Carnitine, CLA, Green Coffee & Garcinia Cambogia Extract which are known for breaking up the fat cells naturally.

This product is 100% vegetarian with no added binders and artificial colour. after using this product you can certainly feel full and after eating even a small meal gives you that extra boost you need to get your weight management into high gear.

This product has premium detox and contains potent antioxidants which protect the body from harmful toxins of the environment and help keep cells working optimally.

It comes in a plastic container with 60 capsules inside it. You need to consume 2 tablets daily before or after the workout or as directed by a qualified healthcare practitioner.

Important Ingredients in Fat Burner

1. Green Tea Extracts

Green tea is one of the most commonly consumed teas in the world. It is very high in Antioxidant and promotes your heart health. It has catechins and a decent amount of Caffeine. Both of these ingredients regulate the hormones that can enhance thermogenesis. Green tea generates thermogenesis by which your body burns calories to digest food and produce heat.

2. Garcinia Cambogia

Garcinia Cambogia is an amazing weight loss supplement. Basically it’s a fruit which contains a high amount of hydroxycitric acid (HCA). It directly blocks Fat Production and Reduces Belly Fat. It is also very helpful in reducing inflammation and decreasing insulin level.

3. L-Carnitine

L-Carnitine is an amino acid which helps to reduce weight and improve brain functioning. It produces energy by transporting fatty acids into your cells so that you can burn it through your workout and cut those extra inches from your body, You can get a small amount of this amino through meat and fish.

4. Caffeine 

Caffeine is mostly used to make you feel more alert and less tired. Caffeine stimulates the nervous system and increases your metabolic rate which maximizes your fat-burning process. It also controls the appetite which reduces your hunger.

5. CLA

CLA known as Conjugated Linoleic Acid especially found in meat and dairy product. This health supplement also used to cure cancer diseases It is a very popular weight loss supplement. It will help you to reduce food intake and it could also reduce body fat levels.

6. Yohimbine

Yohimbine is basically a compound from the plant Pausinystalia Yohimbe. It is mostly used to get rid of stubborn fat from your lower belly and love handles. This supplement works when insulin is low in your body so always use this in a fasted state for optimal results.

7.  Naringin

Naringin is again an amazing weight loss ingredients that are found in citrus fruits especially grapefruit. It will increase antioxidant in your body and maximize metabolic rate to provide you with more focus during your workout.

Fat Burner Side Effects

Before giving you information about how to use a fat burner, I would like to clear some doubt about this. The fat burners are totally natural, there are no harmful ingredients or steroids available in this so you can use any fat burner just make sure it should be authentic.

Now, let’s talk about when to take fat burners or does fat burner can harm us..? so what most of the people do, they consume fat burner as pre-workout before 30 minutes of their exercise. The disadvantage of doing this is that they face problem while sleeping.

It is because all the fat burner contains caffeine and we all know caffeine is probably use to make you focused and alerts that is why people can’t sleep properly so now I am telling you the best way to use a fat burner.

If you are a beginner so take only one pill in the morning empty stomach after 15 days you can consume 2 pills, 1st in the morning empty stomach and 2nd pill in the evening at around 5 PM-6 PM. it doesn’t matter which time you working out.

Conclusion

I would like to inform you that all these fat burners are equally suitable for both men and women. I hope that you liked this article and you have found your ideal fat burner from our list.

If you want my recommendation so after comparing the price, authenticity, features and result, Universal Nutrition Animal Cuts is the clear winner. It’s brand value and positive customer reviews made this product more buyer-friendly.

If you really want to cut some extra inches from your body and looking for best weight loss products so you can check out my Fat Loss Supplement Stack article.

FAQ

Q. Can women use these fat burners?
Yes, women can also use any of these fat burners, all these products are equally suitable for both men and women.

Q. Is there any side effects of fat burner?
No, there are no side effects but always use this product periodically. use fat burner pills for 2 months straight and take a break for 2 weeks and repeat this cycle for better results.

Q. How Much Weight Can I Lose?
Don’t set any wrong expectation but if you make your diet and workout on point so you can easily cut off 1-3 Lbs per week.
